description:
As Goh`s Sobble gets scared easily, it is noticed by an Inteleon of another trainer. Inteleon gives advice and shows-off its moves. Witnessing this, Sobble is more determined to be strong and not be timid.
Source: wikipedia

titles.title: Memmeon spioniert eine stille Strategie aus!
メッソン・イン・ポッシブル!
